abstract: At a dinner 12 years ago in Redmond, Wash., Brian L. Roberts challenged the richest man in the world to invest in his business  cable TV.
snippet: At a dinner 12 years ago in Redmond, Wash., Brian L. Roberts challenged the richest man in the world to invest in his business  cable TV.
lead_paragraph: At a dinner 12 years ago in Redmond, Wash., Brian L. Roberts challenged the richest man in the world to invest in his business  cable TV.

headline.main: For Comcast’s Chief, Content Led the Way
headline.print_headline: For Comcast’s Chief, Content Led the Way

byline.original: By Tim Arango and Brian Stelter

abstract: Brian L. Roberts, head of Comcast, is on the verge of taking over NBC Universal and joining the top ranks of the media industry elite. But how did he get there?
snippet: Brian L. Roberts, head of Comcast, is on the verge of taking over NBC Universal and joining the top ranks of the media industry elite. But how did he get there?
lead_paragraph: At a dinner 12 years ago in Redmond, Wash., Brian L. Roberts challenged the richest man in the world to invest in his business — cable TV.

headline.main: For Comcast Chief, Content Led the Way
